diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Pulmonary blastoma, pleuropulmonary blastoma, pulmonary teratoma
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The tumor was distinct from pulmonary blastoma and pleuropulmonary blastoma, as no pathogenic DICER1 or CTNNB1 variants were identified. Genetic sequencing indicated similarities with ovarian small-cell carcinoma rather than pulmonary blastomas. The tumor exhibited unique histologic features inconsistent with classic biphasic pulmonary blastoma and had a germline SMARCA4 pathogenic variant.
